problem.title: CheckPoint: Compressing a Spring
problem.script:
m=random.choice([0.2,0.4,0.8]) k=random.choice([200,300,600]) v=random.choice([0.6,1.5,2.5])
x= v* math.sqrt( m/ k)
problem.p: A block of mass $m kg slides on a horizontal frictionless table toward a spring with a force constant $k N/m as shown. The block hits the spring at speed $v m/s. How far does the block slide from the time it contacts the spring to the time it stops momentarily?
